quest.name: Broken Steel, Broken Men
journal: Tsuranuki has seen your kind before.
objectives: Use the makeshift bombs to demolish abandoned magitek.
Use the makeshift bombs to demolish abandoned magitek.
Deliver the armor plating to Tsuranuki.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: There's something odd about this man...

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: This...is Tsuranuki.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The Dairyu Moon Gates have guarded the approach to Doma Castle since long before the imperial occupation.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We do not anticipate any great difficulty in gaining entry to the gatehouse as our Doman friends know its every nook and cranny. The challenge will come in preserving the element of surprise. But I am confident the shinobi will rise to the occasion.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: During the rebellion, the imperials turned to their agents among the shinobi, and through their treachery were many of my comrades slaughtered.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: We few who survived have not forgotten that day. The memory of it has spurred us never to neglect our training, that we might be ready to administer revenge.

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Eh? Say again? You would have me fashion armor for villagers who wish to fight imperial regulars?

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Bwahahaha! Mad fools charging boldly to meet their deaths! Bring me steel and I shall give them shells to shield their soft bellies.

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Yes, yes, plates of steel, all that you can carry. The better to shield them from blade and bullet!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: If only it were so simple, Master Tsuranuki. Steel plates are not so easily procured─

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Blind, deaf, and dumb you are, boy! We are awash in broken steel. Magitek, great cylinders come crashing to the earth from on high!

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Shatter them to bits with my explosives. They will not fail you, for I made them to kill imperials, heh heh! Bring me my steel, and you will have your armor.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: ...Well, it's not like we know any other armorers who can help. At least we get to blow things up!

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Of course, the imperials have explosives too, and there is no armor which can protect you from that. Bwahahaha!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I've got my portion!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: We're lucky no patrols overheard the explosions...

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Eh? Eh!? You have the many plates of steel I demanded? Show me!

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Bwahahaha! Then you are committed to your cause! Dressing villagers as soldiers and marching off to war...

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Stupid, stupid fools! Doma is dead, and so are her people!

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Lord Kaien, Lord Hien─all dead! Their blood is on our hands!

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: 'Twas Lord Kaien who saved us. Who spared us the worst when the Garleans came.

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Every shred of pride and honor he cast aside, without a second thought! All to win their trust. All to serve as their puppet. Restored to his throne years later, a paper tiger.

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Such shame he must have felt, but no matter! He would suffer it for his people. A life as slaves is better than none at all, he believed. But not us.

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: After my lady died, we began to whisper in his ears dreams of freedom and liberation. We pushed him to take action, if only a little...

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Ten years of preparation, of machinations. So careful we would be, and yet...and yet!

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Doma burned for our foolishness, not for that of Lord Kaien. Monzen, the enclave─they were razed for our sins! We murdered them all, don't you see? We murdered you all!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: ...You're wrong, Master. We are still here. We are still alive.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: Lord Kaien too lives on. In our hearts, and in his son, for Lord Hien has returned.

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Lord Hien? Alive!? It cannot be. You lie. You lie!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: It's the truth! Hien came back to Doma to help her fight for freedom!

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Could...could it be? My lord Hien yet lives? Oh...oh...

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Bands of steel to bind the chest and belly, yes, yes! I must heat the forge and begin work at once!

dialogue.name: TSURANUKI
dialogue.text: Ten? One hundred? How many do you need? All that and more you shall have!
